name: Cafe Bellissimo (Visual Novel)
description:
You play as a barista working at Cafe Bellissimo and wacky scenarios play out. 

The game has multiple endings based on the choices you make.  

Originally, made for me to get used to ren'py again after a long time of hiatus.

It's a visual novel game based on my friend's fan fic. 

Have fun! :)

btw I don't take credit for any of the artworks or music used in the game here.
